name: Andy
description:
A little About Andy...
Andy is a handsome Husky mix with the most gorgeous ocean blue eyes, and silky black and white coat. He is friendly with humans and other dogs and loves to run and play with his canine friends. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturday 11:30-1:30.

name: Bowie
description:
A little About Bowie...
Meet Bowie! This adorable 10-month-old bundle of joy is ready to steal your heart! At just 15 pounds of pure love, this sweet, affectionate puppy brings endless energy and enthusiasm to everything he does. He is friendly to all ages, including kids. Bowie gets along wonderfully with other dogs, and would love a playmate. He thrives with canine companions and would do best in a home with another dog and a fenced yard. If you're looking for a fun-loving, affectionate companion to join your pack, this sweet pup might be your perfect match! Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturday 11:30-1:30.

name: Breezy
description:
A little About Breezy...
Watch a video of Breezy with his foster mom
Breezy has lived with a family, who unfortunately can no longer care for him, but now enjoys time spent with his loving foster family.  Breezy is a handsome gentle guy who is friendly with people, including older kids, and dogs of all sizes... and will never turn down a good scratch behind the ears. Breezy is a sensitive pup... exceptionally affectionate. He can quietly play by himself with a toy, and be happy to relax right next to you, give you gentle kisses, stare lovingly into your eyes, and just keep you company. He walks nicely on the leash, is housebroken, snuggly... and thinks he is a lap dog. A very sweet boy, who will do best in a quiet, suburban environment. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturday 11:30-1:30.

name: Buddy
description:
A little About Buddy...
Meet Buddy... A gentle soul seeking companionship. This sweet 15-year-old gentleman is the definition of a perfect companion. With his calm, easygoing nature and friendly disposition, he gets along beautifully with everyone...people and pups alike, and is fully housebroken. What he loves most is simply being near you. Whether you're reading, watching TV, or going about your day, he'll be contentedly by your side. He thrives on companionship and would do best in a home where someone is around much of the time, or where there's another pet to keep him company. If you're looking for a loving, low-key companion who will fill your days with gentle affection and unwavering loyalty, this special senior is ready to steal your heart. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Cardi
description:
A little About Cardi...
Meet Cardi… a pup with a heart full of love looking for the perfect match. With her cuddly nature and gentle soul, she’s social with people and has mastered all her manners. She is fully crate trained, is an excellent travel buddy, and is doing very well on potty training.  Wether you’re looking for an active hiking partner or a cozy indoor snuggle buddy, she’s perfectly happy either way. She loves to run and play outdoors but is equally content relaxing at home. This sweet girl thrives in a calm environment and would do best in a home with adults or older children who can appreciate her gentle nature.  She was deeply loved in her current home, but their circumstances have changed, and they can no longer care for her. Could you be the perfect fit for this sweet soul? Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Casper
description:
A little About Casper...
Meet Petrescue's own adorable white puppy named Casper. With his expressive dark eyes, forever alert ears and head tilt that seems to say... "did someone say treat?"... he is waiting to charm his forever family. Casper is housebroken and crate trained. He has a lot of love to give and would do well as the only pet in his forever home. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Cassie
description:
A little About Cassie...
Meet Cassie - a very sweet, playful girl who bonds closely with her people and loves a calm, predictable home. Approximately 3 years old and 18 pounds, she is very affectionate, loyal, and happiest when she can relax near her humans. She loves a good cuddle and will happily give lots of kisses!  She would do best in a home where someone is around often, without young children, and ideally as the only dog. She can get overwhelmed by busy environments, other dogs in the home, and being left alone, so she needs a patient adopter who can give her stability and routine. She greets other dogs nicely outside of the home and plays well in a neutral environment, like a dog park. She is housebroken, and leash trained. She also exhibits a preference towards women.  In the right home, she is incredibly loving, devoted, and eager to be someone’s special companion. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & greet Saturday 11:30-1:30.

name: Chapo Bear
description:
A little About Chapo Bear...
Meet Chapo Bear! This little boy is a total 9 pound snuggle bear...nothing but love and snuggles! This sweetheart is the perfect little companion! He is super sweet, friendly with dogs, that match his calm demeanor... and even cats are his friends. He is obedient, and walks nicely on the leash, and is potty trained. Chapo is ready to bring joy and companionship to his forever home. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Chico
description:
A little About Chico...
Chico is a fun-loving little boy who loves to go for walks in the neighborhood as well as exploring new places on hikes around Westchester and beyond.  He also loves to play with his squeaky toys when he is not cuddling on the couch with his favorite humans.  He is a lowrider who is sure to bring joy to any family.  He plays well with children and knows basic commands such as sit and heel, and is fully housebroken.  Chico will bring fun and joy to any family! If you are interested in meeting Chico, be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Chloe
description:
A little About Chloe...
Chloe is an incredibly sweet, loving, and gentle dog who had a tough start to life. She’s cautious and wary of new humans but enjoys the company of other dogs, and once she warms up to you (which could be as quickly as a day or two), she’s playful, happy, and expressive (she’ll gently paw at you to beg for belly rubs!), and Chloe is cat friendly. She is fully housetrained, beautifully crate trained, and is very obedient. She is adorably food motivated and loves nothing more than to lay down next to her favorite human for naps and to give gentle kisses. Chloe would do best in a household with adults - preferably a “mama” figure - as she tends to relax and warm up easiest this way. If you can show her a little calm and patience while she warms up to you, you’ll be rewarded with a goofy, loyal, loving companion for life! Be sure to complete an application on line, monitor our website for updates, and come to our Meet & Greet Saturday 11:30-1:30.

name: Clara
description:
A little About Clara...
Meet Clara, a beautiful girl with soulful eyes and a gentle nature.  Clara is equal parts nose and heart. She loves long hikes and playtime with other dogs, and an occasional howl. This gentle easygoing pup will thrive with active families and plenty of exercise. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Coco
description:
A little About Coco...
Coco is a sweet girl who will steal your heart once she gets to know you...just look at that smile! She will take a little time to warm up, but once she does, she will be your best friend forever. Coco loves belly rubs, snuggles, playtime in the yard, playing fetch and going for walks.  Coco finds city living a little too hectic, and is not suited for apartment living.  She will do well in an adult only home...a house with a fenced in yard.  She is a little snobby and can be dog selective when it cones to choosing canine buddies.  Coco would appreciate a dedicated, enthusiastic companion who will work on building her trust, and she will return that love and trust twofold. Watch a video of sweet Coco.

name: Donner
description:
A little About Donner...
Donner is a strikingly handsome pup, with a gentle, earnest expression. Donner is probably a Catahoula Leopard dog mix...deep black/ brown on his face, white chest and deep brown coat. He is comfortable in his foster home with his older canine buddy and is friendly to family members and other dogs. Donner is house trained and comfortably sleeps in his crate during the night, he even sometimes chooses to nap there during the day with the door open. Donner enjoys his toys and is patient and receptive to new people. He will be a great addition to his forever family.  Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Eleanor
description:
A little About Eleanor...
Eleanor is a sweet little lovebug waiting for her forever home. She is wee pad and outdoor trained (prefers outside,) loves walks, and prefers nothing better than to snuggle with her human on the couch. She loves to play woth her stuffed toy, and run through the Autumn leaves. She is easygoing, a good listener and catches on to routines very easily. Eleanor is happy to share her home with humans, dogs, and children alike. She most likely would do great with cats as well, though no formal testing has happened. Eleanor sleeps through the night and is an all around good girl. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30

name: Enoch
description:
A little About Enoch...
Enoch is a handsome 3.5 year old, Husky who is a blend of the breed’s signature spirit and city-smart manners. Enoch is friendly, completely housebroken, walks beautifully on his leash and is comfortable with city life. He is good with other dogs, and cats, in fact Enoch lived with a cat. If you are interested in meeting Enoch, be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Enzo
description:
A little About Enzo...
Meet Enzo, a Sweet 10-Month-Old Goldendoodle! This adorable pup is the total package—smart, gentle, and full of love. At just 10 months old, he already knows basic commands...sit, come paw, stay. He is fully housebroken, and also crate trained. Enzo is a quiet guy who doesn’t bark and has a calm, happy energy that makes him a joy to be around. Enzo absolutely loves going on walks, soaking up belly rubs, and curling up at your feet after a good outing. Playtime is his favorite, and he’s wonderfully friendly with both people and other dogs. If you’re looking for a sweet, well-mannered companion who’s ready to bring joy into your home, this Goldendoodle is the perfect match!

name: Foster A Dog
description:
A little About FOSTER A DOG...
Pet Rescue is looking for foster homes who want to help nurture dogs and puppies until they find their furever family.  When you share your home with a rescue dog, you provide them with the love, socialization and support they need to be successful in their future home. As a foster home, you’ll be gathering valuable information about your foster’s behavior which will help to place him/her in the best home.
 
Pet Rescue provides vetting, food and all the essentials necessary for your fosters day-to-day needs, so you can focus on providing love and support to your rescue pup.
What are you waiting for? Complete an application to foster today, and get ready to save a life, and change your life forever.
https://ny-petrescue.org/Adoption-Process

name: Gem
description:
A little About Gem...
This sweet 3-year-old pup weighs just 13 lbs and is the perfect companion for any home. She is friendly with people and other dogs, and is settling in nicely in her foster home. Already housebroken and crate-trained, Gem makes life easy. In fact, Gem’s 8 year old human foster brother says “ Gem makes life happier”. quite a recommendation! She already knows basic commands, and has an affectionate and playful personality. Whether you're looking for a snuggle buddy or a playful pal, Gem is eager to find her forever home. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Kaner
description:
A little About Kaner...
Hi there, I’m Kaner! I may be 9 years old and just 6 pounds, but don’t let my size or age fool you — I’ve got the heart of a pup half my age! When I wake up, I greet the morning like it’s the best day ever — because it is! There's so much fun to be had! Birds to chase, butterflies to stalk, bees to follow (carefully), and dogs to zoom with. But after all the adventures of the day, I like my dinner, one last stroll, and then it's off to bed by 7pm sharp ... and I sleep like a log until 7am. So, what do you say? If you’re ready to smile more, worry less, and wake up with joy in your heart, I’m your quirky little guy! Come meet him at our Meet & Greet Saturday 11:30-1:30.

name: Keaton
description:
A little About Keaton...
Keaton is a stunningly beautiful boy with the softest, most luxurious coat. He is friendly with other dogs, especially if they are playful, and loves going to the dog park. He fetches and chases balls, especially if it’s his special orange ball. During the day, he is totally chill and a perfect work-from-home companion. He is also very sweet and affectionate, and loves being petted. Though adventurous and affectionate at heart, Keaton is a sensitive soul. He is cautious when introduced to new things, new people and new places, like going to the vet’s office – he reacts by hiding behind the comfort of his person. He loves going on walks so he can patrol the neighborhood squirrels. Keaton is looking for an active, loving home where he can be your best friend. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturday 11:30-1:30.

name: Kira
description:
A little About Kira...
Meet Kira! This 5 month hold puppy, with deep, soulful brown eyes, a distinguished black snout,  perfectly floppy ears and a sultry look will steal your heart. Kira is friendly with people and loves to play with her canine buddies. But after play time, she is happy to relax and drink up that sunshine. She is currently accepting treats and belly rubs and of course applications for her new forever home. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Kobe
description:
A little About Kobe...
Meet Kobe, a loving 2 year old Standard Poodle, looking for his forever home. Kobe is bursting with love and friendliness! This curly haired, sweet neutered boy is searching for a new family to love. He's neutered, current on all his vaccinations and has been well-cared for by his previous family, who unfortunately can no longer care for him. Kobe has that wonderful poodle energy and intelligence. He is smart and eager to please. When he is happy  (which is always) he shows it with his whole body. Kobe is a sweet boy who needs an experienced owner with a firm, consistent approach to training.  We are committed to working with Kobe’s new family to help train him to channel all that enthusiasm.  This handsome boy is ready to bring joy, laughter, and unconditional love to his new home. With the right guidance, this lovable goofball will become an amazing companion. He just needs someone who can match his energy with calm, confident leadership. Be sure to complete an application on line and come say hello to Kobe at our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Koda
description:
A little About Koda...
Koda is a handsome, big-hearted, sweet, affectionate pup who is looking for his perfect forever home. At 6 years old, he is housebroken and has  the perfect balance of playful energy and cozy cuddle time. Koda loves to play with toys but also enjoys quiet time,  just settling in next to you on the couch for some quality TV time.  Koda is fine living with cats. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Maple
description:
A little About Maple...
Maple is a sweet, affectionate dog who loves being close to her people. She’s goofy, fun, and happiest when snuggled on the couch in a blanket or lounging in a sunny spot. She enjoys walks, squeaky toys, rolling in the grass, and chewing on her favorite trachea bone treats. She’s house-trained and comfortable in a crate for short stretches, especially when she knows she’s not alone. Maple is very smart and learns quickly—she’s treat-motivated indoors and eager to please. She even knows a few tricks! Outside, she’s still working on staying calm and focused, but she’s making great progress with consistent training. She rides well in the car and makes a cheerful, relaxed travel companion. Maple should be the only pet in the home. While she generally does well seeing other dogs in public, she does best in a calm, low-distraction setting. She’s a loving companion who thrives with routine, activity, and connection. With the right person or in the right household, Maple will be the sweetest and most loyal best friend. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Max
description:
A little About Max...
Max is a small, sweet pup with a big personality and an even bigger heart. He has some mild vision impairment, but it doesn’t slow him down—he navigates his world with confidence, curiosity, and plenty of enthusiasm. Max is very good in his crate, sleeps soundly through the night, and is doing well on housebreaking when kept on a schedule. He currently lives with two dogs and gets along beautifully with them. He will do well in a home with another calm, friendly dog who can help show him the ropes. Max LOVES toys and has the funniest way of inviting you to play—complete with silly noises and bouncy little hops. He’s also a big fan of walks and enjoys frolicking around the yard, and loves to take rides. Max is a great communicator and isn’t shy about expressing himself with his signature soundtrack of goofy, endearing noises. Most of all, Max is eager to please and ready to bond. We believe that Max will do best with someone who has terrier experience, as he has a typical terrier personality…energetic, feisty, intelligent, and tenacious. He is independent in spirit, which may make him less traditionally obedient. Max looking for a loving, patient home, that will give him the confidence, structure, and affection he deserves. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Maxwell Smart
description:
A little About Maxwell Smart...
Maxwell Smart is an adorable little puppy, showing off his cute head tilt. He is sweet, playful, and friendly to people, other dogs and even cats. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturday 11:30-1:30.

name: Miss Thunder
description:
A little About Miss Thunder...
Meet Miss Thunder! She is a new member of the Petrescue pack and she is totally delicious.  She is sweet & friendly to people and loves to run and play with her fellow puppies. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Mollie
description:
A little About Mollie...
Meet Mollie! This adorable 4-month-old brindle beauty greets new friends with a wagging tail and bright, curious eyes. She is friendly with people and other dogs, and with dogs, she’s a total social butterfly—playful, and always excited for a good romp with her canine buddies. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Nugget
description:
A little About Nugget...
Meet Nugget! This handsome 5 year old French Bulldog is the ultimate companion. He is a friendly guy, open to meeting new people. With his adorable bat ears and squishy face, he’s mastered the art of making friends wherever he goes. Nugget knows the “sit” command and is working on others. He is great in the crate …as long as he has his bed he’s happy. He is housebroken, loves chewing Nyla bones, and likes to snuggle, but also likes his space. Nugget is an easy dog to care for and good company. He wants to give you all his love, and prefers to be the only 4 legged member of his forever home. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30

name: Ocean
description:
A little About Ocean...
Watch a video of sweet Ocean
Meet Ocean. He is a sweet, happy 2 year old pup who is friendly with people and other dogs. Ocean is working on commands and is learning “leave it”, “come” and “good boy”. He is playful and loving and deliciously huggable...and is housebroken when kept on a schedule. Ocean is currently living happily with his foster canine buddy and enjoying their walks together. He sleeps quietly overnight and enjoys taking in the view on his foster’s sun porch. In the morning he waits very patiently and quietly by the door in his foster home, waiting for his morning walk. Ocean is a sweetheart. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Princess Leah
description:
A little About Princess Leah...
Princess Leah is a beautiful 6 month old puppy. She is sweet, playful, friendly with people and other dogs, and even cats. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturday 11:30-1:30.

name: Ramona
description:
A little About Ramona...
Ramona is a gorgeous 5 year old, 30 pound Husky mix, with a wonderfully alert and dignified expression. She is quiet, friendly with people, including kids and other dogs. Ramona is great on the leash and loves to walk and be active. She is housebroken and crate trained. Ramona has been living in a foster home in the city, and is not bothered with city noises. Be sure to complete an application on line and come say hi to Ramona at our Meet & Greet Saturday 11:30-1:30.

name: Rocky
description:
A little About Rocky...
Rocky is a handsome 2 year old Beagle. He is friendly with people and other dogs, and is just settling in to Petrescue. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturday 11:30-1:30.

name: Royale
description:
A little About Royale...
Watch a sweet video of Royale
Meet Royale! This stunning Husky Mix will capture your heart the moment you look into those gorgeous blue eyes! With a sweet personality and excellent leash manners, he is ready to become your perfect walking companion. If you are looking for a loyal friend with movie star looks, Royale is waiting to meet you. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Seven
description:
A little About Seven...
Meet Seven, a 5 month old brindle pup..a gentle soul with a heart full of sunshine. He is friendly with people and other dogs, and he brings a calm, easygoing energy wherever he goes. Seven loves playtime, chasing toys, exploring with friends, and showing off his puppy enthusiasm, but he's jus as happy to settle down afterward, Once playtime winds down, you'll find him stretched out beside his buddies, soaking up the sun and enjoying a quiet cuddle.  With his soft manners and joyful spirit, Seven is the perfect companion for anyone looking for a balanced mix of fun and tranquility. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Shadow
description:
A little About Shadow...
Shadow demonstrates how he'll greet you each day
Meet Shadow! You would never guess that this 24-lb min pin mix is 10 years old — he still has lots of spunk and love to give. He's a handsome boy, with a sleek, shiny black coat, with  burnt orange highlights on his face, chest and paws.  Shadow is doing well in his foster home and loves spending time with his foster buddy, who looks so much like him. He is friendly, energetic and eager to meet his new forever family. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Simba
description:
A little About Simba...
Petrescue has just welcomed our own Simba!... a very handsome 4 year old Golden Retriever. Simba is a friendly guy and is settling in nicely, enjoying the company of other dogs and walks with our volunteers. Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Sussy
description:
A little About Sussy...
Sussy is an active, playful puppy, friendly with people and other dogs and is even potty trained. Sussy LOVES to cuddle with other dogs and is a  perfect friend for another dog. She is in Heaven alternating between playing and snuggling with her foster brother... Sussy is always by his side. Even if he doesn't want to play, Sussy is happy to sit near him, give him a lick and lay down beside him.  If you're looking for an active, social companion who will keep you smiling and moving, Sussy might be your perfect match! Be sure to complete an application on line and come to our Meet & Greet Saturdays 11:30-1:30.

name: Zz Bella And Roscoe-Courtesy Listing
description:
A little About ZZ Bella and Roscoe-Courtesy Listing...
We would love these two dogs to find a forever home together, but it is not absolutely necessary.
Bella and Roscoe are a beautiful brother–sister duo who have grown up together and share a truly special bond. They’re both incredibly sweet, affectionate dogs who want nothing more than a safe, loving home where they can be part of the family. Both pups had a full vet check-up and updated vaccines on 11/18/25 They’re healthy, up-to-date, and have no medical issues. They are gentle, friendly, and have never shown any aggression  toward people. They both did a 16 hour road trip without any complications, no barking, no whining, and no climbing.
Bella is a total sweetheart with a huge heart and even bigger personality. She loves pets, neck scratches, and belly rubs — and she’ll happily melt right into you for attention. She has a playful, energetic side outdoors, but she settles nicely once inside and loves relaxing with her humans. Bella can get excited and may jump up to greet you, but it’s all love and enthusiasm. She enjoys fetch, chew toys, and exploring new scents. She’s great with other dogs — always eager to say hello — and if another dog gets too pushy, she’ll simply bark to communicate. She’s been doing wonderfully on a leash. She gets curious and may stop to sniff, but listens well when you encourage her to keep moving. She has not had any accidents inside the house and has been responding very well to a walking routine. An angel in the car. 

Roscoe is our gentle giant — a big, lovable teddy bear who just wants someone to be near. He’s more low-key than Bella but still enjoys playtime, cuddles, and belly rubs (his absolute favorite). He’s curious about other dogs and may pause to look, but he doesn’t pull. If another dog becomes aggressive, he’ll give a bark, but overall he’s calm and easygoing. Because of his size and his early inexperience with walks, he’s currently using a prong collar for guidance — and he has made huge progress. Initially Roscoe was hesitant to get moving, but now, with a gentle correction, he happily follows along and often walks right at your side. If pulled too firmly, he may flop over for attention instead — he’s truly a softie at heart. He's an angel in the car. If you are interested in these dogs please contact: sean.lum92@gmail.com

name: Zz Chip- Courtesy Listing
description:
A little About ZZ Chip- Courtesy Listing...
Meet Chip… You’re new best friend!  Chip is a sweet, happy 4 year old pup with a friendly, affectionate personality.  He loves being around people and exploring the outdoors. He is great with kids, other dogs...and also cats, making him the perfect addition for a family home.  Chip is full of love, energy and that classic big smile charm. He is ready to find his forever family. Chip is a loyal companion who will bring joy to any home. Could that home be yours? Adopt Chip today and give him the loving home he deserves. If you are interested in this dog, please contact:  Megan 914-419-7470

name: Zz Desiree-Courtesy Listing
description:
A little About ZZ Desiree-Courtesy Listing...
Desiree is a 6yr old spayed female mixed breed… most probably hound and terrier.  She's up to date on all vaccines, is in good health, and has been loved and taken care of by one owner since she was a puppy. Desiree has been in a home with other dogs her whole life. She's also good with other pets. She's mild tempered and enjoys laying around outside. Desiree is friendly and sweet and has proven to be a great companion for older people as her original owner was an older women. If you are interested in this dog, please contact  Erika 914-523-6420

name: Zz Duecxe-Courtesy Listing
description:
A little About ZZ Duecxe-Courtesy Listing...
Hi My name Is Duecxe. I'm 8 months old and I'm the oldest of my 4 brothers and I'm definitely the leader of my pack. I'm very protective and a big boy for 8 months old but I promise to love you and make sure you are safe and sound...and definitely alert you to the mailman. I'm harmless and loving and a very good boy. I'm potty trained and I love running and playing in the yard. I'm great with children, and also the elderly. If you are interested in the dog please contact  jlhwaters@gmail.com

name: Zz Finn-Courtesy Listing
description:
A little About ZZ Finn-Courtesy Listing...
Meet Finn.  He became homeless when his owner recently passed away. Finn is an awesome 2yr old German Shepherd. True to his breed, he is smart and loyal. He was well bred and has great structure and hips.  He responds well to ALL spoken commands, is housebroken, and takes food gently. He is excellent in the house  and quietly follows you around.  Finn is neutered, up to date on vaccines, walks very well on the leash and does 'his business quickly once outside. Finn  prefers spending time with his person and would do best with a quiet home with lots of love. Finn enjoys bird watching but is definitely a squirrel chaser. Finn would benefit from a place to run (a large fenced yard would be great) and an active lifestyle, although he is capable of being a couch potato as well. He is young and deserves a forever home to call his own.  This young handsome boy needs a forever home asap, as his foster family will be traveling at the end of October!  If interested please contact 646-207-6966 or ldellatte@hotmail.com

name: Zz Flower-Courtesy Listing
description:
A little About ZZ Flower-Courtesy Listing...
THREE-LEGGED FLOWER WILL BLOOM WITH YOUR ADOPTION  Meet Flower, a sweet and courageous three-legged dog seeking a forever home. After surviving a dog attack and being seriously hurt, Flower was rescued from her neglectful owner by a stranger. She’s demonstrated remarkable resilience and despite requiring leg amputation. she moves effortlessly, including navigating stairs. In a previous foster setting, she harmoniously coexisted with smaller dogs and a cat. However, she’s selective about canine companions and cautious around children.  Now a year and 1/2 old, fully vaccinated, spayed, and weighing 40 pounds, she’s eager for a loving environment. Basic training and housebreaking is complete, and additional training will be paid for. Flower is most likely full size, and ever so ready to provide affection and loyalty. A key aspect of her personality is her love for cuddling. A true testament about this sweet pooch from her rescuer; “I want so badly to get this sweet girl to a great home. She is very special.” Flower is in Sleepy Hollow and ready to meet you. learn more or arrange a meeting, please only contact Pia at  914-505-0532  or drpiasalk@gmail.com

name: Zz Halo-Courtesy Listing
description:
A little About ZZ Halo-Courtesy Listing...
Hi my name is Halo. I'm 8 months old & I'm #2 of 4 brothers but I act like the oldest. I'm very mature for my age, but of course  I love snuggles and cuddles. I love to chase the mop when mom is cleaning., and I play just as much as I nap...which is a lot. I'm potty trained and love kids... and I'm great with elderly people too.  I'm looking for a new home I'd love to be able to run and play with my family. If you are interested in this dog please contact   jlhwaters@gmail.com

name: Zz Max-Courtesy Listing
description:
A little About ZZ Max-Courtesy Listing...
Hi my Name is Max. I'm 8 months old and a big baby literally. I'm very playful with my brothers but very chill and relaxed when I'm with my mom. I'm good with both children and elderly adults.I like to chase the mop when mom is cleaning but overall im a good boy looking for a loving home. If you are interested in this dog please contact  jlhwaters@gmail.com

name: Zz Petey-Courtesy Listing
description:
A little About ZZ Petey-Courtesy Listing...
Meet Petey! He is a young spirited beautiful dog. He is loving, affectionate, and playful. Petey loves people, good with dogs and kids over 12 yrs old, due to size, BUT NOT GOOD WITH CATS! Petey is neutered, UTD on shots and microchipped. He is an amazing dog in a home! He is housebroken, not destructive at all. He loves to take walks or just chill in a fenced in yard. Petey is hoping for a forever home for Christmas. Will you be the special person to grant him his Christmas wish? Apply now. Help me make this beautiful boy’s wish come true! If interested please contact 646-207-6966 or ldellatte@hotmail.com

name: Zz Six-Courtesy Listing
description:
A little About ZZ Six-Courtesy Listing...
Six is a handsome 22 Month old, 61 pound Black Mouth Cur mix.  He is neutered, housebroken, and up to date on all vaccines. Six is a friendly pup...he loves other animals and is great with kids. He is energetic and loves to swim. Six is a great dog and much loved, but unfortunately one of his house members has developed an allergy and Six is looking for a new forever home. If you are interested in this dog, please contact   Kellie at   leveillek06@gmail.com  772-834-2444

name: Zz Sly-Courtesy Listing
description:
A little About ZZ Sly-Courtesy Listing...
Sly is a spunky, 3-year-old Jack Russell/Rat Terrier mix is ready to steal your heart—and maybe your tennis ball! Sly is every bit the classic terrier: smart, energetic, and totally toy-obsessed. Balls, squeakers, stuffies—you name it, he’s all in. He’s housebroken, loves leash walks, loves car rides (a true gentleman on the road), and forms a deep bond with his person. Once he picks you, he’s your loyal shadow, ready to join you on every daily errand or adventure. Sly would thrive in a home where someone is around most of the time and happy to include him in their day-to-day routine. He’s not the kind of dog who likes to be left behind—he’s a “ride or die” kind of pup. While he can learn to coexist with most dogs given proper introduction, Sly definitely prefers to be the king of his castle. He’d be happiest as your one and only.  No cats for sly. If you’re looking for a devoted sidekick with a big personality in a small package, Sly might just be your match. If you are interested in this dog please contact www.waggingtailsdogrescueny.org

name: Zz Teddy-Courtesy Listing
description:
A little About ZZ Teddy-Courtesy Listing...
Hi... my name is Teddy. I'm 8 months old and the runt of a litter of 4 so I think I'm a big boy even though I'm the smallest. I'm potty trained and love playing with my toys, running around the yard and cuddling at night with my mom. I wake up ready to play and I love kids. I look forward to snuggling with my human great grandma in the morning and would love to be able to run and play with my family. If you are interested in this dog, please contact jlhwaters@gmail.com

name: Brianna
description: Meet Brianna — the sweetheart with the cutest Yoda ears! Brianna is a total lovebug who melts hearts wherever she goes. She’s friendly, affectionate, and always ready for an adventure. Whether it’s a leisurely walk or a cozy night in, Brianna’s happiest just being by your side. This resilient girl was found as a stray in New York with multiple large abdominal masses; she desperately needed medical care that the municipal shelter couldn’t provide. Thankfully, she got her second chance with us and is now healthy, healing, and overflowing with gratitude and love. Brianna deserves her happily ever after. If you’re looking for a loyal, gentle, and joyful companion with the most adorable Yoda ears, Brianna is your girl. Apply to adopt Brianna today and give her the forever home she’s been waiting for! All dogs will be altered, microchipped, and receive age-appropriate vaccines prior to adoption. name: Emoji
description: Hi! I just arrived! My foster pawrents are getting to know me and will add more info soon. Put Short Bio here: Emoji is a fun loving and adventurous pup! He's got a lot of energy which he burns off by running and chasing his ball and playing with his toys. He's mastered sit and is almost completely potty trained. He's very social loves meeting new people and is interested and likes other dogs! Fill out all below: Personality & Characteristics: spunky, energetic, sweet My foster dog is good with: (Dogs, Kids) My foster dog is: house trained Energy Level (1= calm, 10= high energy): 6 Barker? Or Quiet Pup?: quiet only barks at his toys occasionally Appetite: loves food! 3 meals a day Favorite Things: balls, toys, exploring Commands/Tricks: sit, wait ALL adoptions require a completed application and final contract. name: Amped
description: Say hi to Amped! Loyal, sweet, and energetic pup. When we first picked him up, he walked right up to us with his tail wagging ready to go home. He went straight into the back seat of the car and took a quiet nap on his hour drive to his temporary home. He warmed up to our family very quickly and likes to check in on us when we go into separate rooms to make sure everything is okay. He's becoming a pro at being in his crate when we are not home and when he uses it to sleep some nights he gives no fuss and quietly sleeps. He is the best pup at using the bathroom outside and has had zero accidents in the house! He is learning to walk slowly and steady on his leash while he takes in all the new sites and scents. Although he is very playful he is equally a snuggler/napper. With some training and lots of love, I guarantee that Amped (aka Ranger) will be the best companion. My foster dog is good with: Dogs (not tested with kids or cats) My foster dog is: Crate trained, house trained, Low shed 3 Keywords for your pup: Loyal, Loving, Playful Energy Level (1 = calm, 10 = high energy): 6 Barker? Or Quiet Pup?: Barks at the door and unfamilar sounds Walking Manners: Learning quickly, already improving on leash Appetite: Mealtime is his favorite. Favorite Things: Mealtime, snuggles, playtime (especially tug of war). Commands/Tricks: Knows “sit,” "lay down", learning “stay”, “come”, and "give me paw" ALL adoptions require a completed application and final contract. name: Pepper
description: Pepper is the sweetest, most loving boy. He spent his first two years in a happy home with kids after being adopted through Waldo’s, but his owner sadly lost his job and home and can no longer keep him. Pepper loves going on walks and runs and gets an A++ for eating. He’s potty trained and rarely has accidents, though he’s still working on keeping up his good habits in a new home. He loves being petted and gets so excited when it’s time to go outside. He’s playful, gentle, and such a good boy in the house. Pepper has so much love to give and will make the sweetest, happiest companion.

name: Baby Miami
description: Meet Miami — the sunshine girl with a heart full of love! Once a stray in Florida, Baby Miami ended up in a shelter that sadly didn’t have the resources to care for her. Her life was at risk, so we stepped in and brought her all the way to New York. It may not be the palm-tree paradise she came from, but Miami is thriving in the big city. This sweet girl has adorable puppy energy, loves to cuddle, and is completely unaware of her own size, which only makes her more lovable. Miami is a good girl through and through, and she’s ready to shower her forever family with joy and affection. If you’re looking for a happy-hearted, cuddly companion who radiates sunshine wherever she goes, Miami is your girl. All dogs will be altered, microchipped, and receive age-appropriate vaccines prior to adoption. Please note that the listed location for this dog may not be accurate due to technical limitations of this database and we have transportation options available within 6 hours of NYC (so don't let location hold you back)! name: Dogberry (Berry)
description: I’m a lovable young pup with a shiny black coat and an even brighter personality. I’m curious, excited, and full of energy— the perfect adventure buddy. Personality & Characteristics: Sweet, social, and smart! I love being near my humans, exploring new things, frolicking in the rain, running and chasing and most of all - soaking up affection and love. I’m still learning some manners, but I’m picking them up quickly. Berry Videos Good with: ✅ Dogs | ✅ Kids | ❓ Cats (not tested yet) I’m: 🐶 Crate trained | 🚽 Working on house training | 🖤 Low shed 3 Keywords for your pup: Playful · Affectionate · Loyal Energy Level (1= calm, 10= high energy): 7 (enough pep for fun walks and playtime, but loves naps too!) Barker? Or Quiet Pup?: Barker (mainly to alert of potty time and looking for attention) Walking Manners: Very good, and getting better every day! I love walks and respond well to gentle guidance on leash. Great on elevators and with greeting others. Loves meeting new people and pups. A little timid of all of the new sights and sounds, will pause to take in new surroundings but no barking and will continue walk without any assistance. Appetite: Big fan of mealtime — food is my love language. Favorite Things: Enrichment toys (like a Kong), running, walks. Commands/Tricks: working on commands but a great 'sitter' in public. ALL adoptions require a completed application and final contract. name: Holly Jolly
description: Holly Jolly lives up to her name. She is a bubbly, energetic and friendly girl who always has something to wag her tail about. She loves her long walks and will cozy up beside you when she is at home in between. She is respectful of your things and is completely house broken. She loves people and will try to snuggle up with everyone! She loves her food and is an extremely good leaner/listener as she responds to things like wait, sit, stay, no, and leave it. Personality & Characteristics: My foster dog is good with: Dogs My foster dog is: (Crate trained, House trained, Low shed) Crate trained, House trained 3 Keywords for your pup: Energy Level (1= calm, 10= high energy): Barker? name: Doris
description: Doris - 1 year, 18lbs, Corgi/Beagle Mix, Spayed This dog is eligible to join our foster-to-adopt program. Please email fostertoadopt@socialteesnyc.org with the animal’s name in the subject line if you are interested! Want to straight up adopt? Submit an adoption application a t socialteesnyc.org Level of dog ownership experience needed: BEGINNER: This means we predict this dog will be low on the challenge scale due to its breed/age combo. Potentially a good fit for someone who has relevant dog care experience (fostering, dog sitting) and is looking to adopt their first pup. Energy level MEDIUM: Needs a daily 60 walk or window of quick paced exercise (minimum) in addition to potty break strolls (10-30 min each). Also needs significant socializing opportunities outside the home and mental stimulation at home like tricks training practice, chew items, and puzzle toys. (This is regardless of dog size – many small breeds were designed for lots of activity and will exhibit unwanted behavior when they’re understimulated.) Okay in the city? We don’t know yet. Most adult dogs do well in the city after they’ve had time to adjust to a new environment, but some never adapt and need homes in the burbs. Potty trained? Probably! Adults usually are, but all will have transitional accidents for the first week or so. A consistent walking route and schedule plus finding spots with grass or dirt can help. Social with other dogs? Yes, but we don’t know to what degree yet. Some like to wrestle with every passing pup, others can coexist well but prefer to keep to themselves. We’ll learn more soon. Social with cats? Not sure yet! Some breed mixes that are generally NOT great matches for homes with cats include large hounds, huskies, and shepherds. Comfortable with children? (ALWAYS requires adult supervision) We’re not sure yet, but we try to err on the side of caution. Respectful kids ages 8 and up are probably a safe bet. Children must always be monitored and taught to interact with dogs of any age respectfully. Medical status Healthy as far as we know. Up to date on their DHPP, Bordetella, and Rabies vaccines; heartworm tested if coming from the South or Puerto Rico ; spayed/neutered; microchipped; treated with dewormer upon intake How this dog ended up with Social Tees: Most of our dogs come via partner groups who help us save them from shelters where they are at risk of euthanasia in Tennessee, Los Angeles and Puerto Rico. There are very few spay/neuter resources there and many more animals in those areas than there are people to adopt them. Rescue groups like ours bring them to the northeast where the desire for pets like these allows us to save their lives. PLEASE NOTE: We cannot guarantee any breed mix, exact age, or full grown size (if the dog is under a year old). We do our best with very educated guesses though! This animal is not at the Social Tees office, all are in foster homes. LEARN MORE ABOUT US: socialteesnyc.org and Instagram @socialteesnyc

name: Wilson
description: Name: Wilson Age: 9 years old Weight: 75 lbs Breed: American bulldog Mix ⸻ Senior gentleman Wilson has had an unpredictable home for most of his life. He ended up in the shelter a few times because his owner could not take care of him, but he was always eventually reclaimed. When his owner was evicted in September, Wilson and his feline sibling were left behind, trapped in their apartment. Thankfully they were rescued, but for Wilson it was the start of a difficult few months. Back in the city shelter once again, Wilson slowly started to shut down, becoming more anxious everyday, eventually refusing to go on walks, interact with staff and barely eating. In November, Wilson was moved to the euthanasia list and his time was running out. Thankfully, at the last minute a kind hearted foster came forward and agreed to take in this gentle giant so we were able to welcome him to our rescue. Wilson was a little nervous at all the changes, but after a few days of love and attention in a home with 2 cats and a small dog, Wilson relaxed and showed us what an amazing addition to any family he would. Wilson is a happy, playful guy who adores spending time with his people. He doesn’t need to sleep in the bed with you but he would love to curl up in a dog bed right beside you at night. He doesn’t need to be entertained when you want a quiet evening but he would love to snuggle on the couch with you. He doesn’t need you to take him hiking every weekend but he would love a game of fetch at the park. Wilson is cat, dog and kid friendly, but he is a big boy who will need a playdate with dogs and kids before deciding if he is the right match for you. Wilson had some issues with his teeth when he first came to us but has had a full dental and is now in much better shape. He does have some teeth missing and would do well with softer food and treats. If you think you can give Wilson all the love he deserves and would like to meet him, please go to Petstablished.com or follow the link below to complete an application to adopt. All of our animals are in foster homes. For the sake of our animals and foster families, you must have an approved application with references before you can meet them. http://shelterchic.org/adopt/ In order to receive a speedy response to any inquiry, please email us directly at Info@ShelterChic.org or check out our website ShelterChic.org where you will find the answer to most questions about our adoption process and fees. Please remember that our organization is run entirely by volunteers in our spare time, and emails are responded to in order of importance. If you do not hear from us and cannot find the information needed on our website or in our animals profile, please reach out to us again. For more images and tales of our pets in foster-care check out our social media pages @shelterchic and @shelterchicanimals

name: Jackrabbit
description: Meet Jackrabbit – Your Next Adventure Buddy! 🐾 Smart, curious, and always ready to explore— Jackrabbit is the total package. Once a stray in Mississippi, this outdoorsy pup has blossomed into a confident, enrichment-loving explorer who’s just waiting for the right person to share life’s journey with. Whether it’s a hike through the woods, a stroll through the neighborhood, or learning new tricks, Jackrabbit is eager, attentive, and ready to be your loyal sidekick. He thrives on stimulation, loves being part of the action, and will make every day a little more exciting. All dogs will be altered, microchipped, and receive age-appropriate vaccines prior to adoption. name: Daisy
description: Playful, love-bug Daisy is a 55lbs, 1 year old, female mix breed dog looking for a home with lots of love to share. Daisy is the perfect family dog, good with other dogs, cats and people of all ages. Daisy loves to be a part of the action whatever you’re doing. Cuddling on the couch, walks in the park, a car trip…every activity is her idea of good time. Daisy recently had surgery on her hind leg to fix a tear on her CCL (doggy version of an ACL) which caused her knee cap to move out of place. We are unsure what caused the injury, but she is healing very well and should make a full recovery. She is a high energy dog who would be happy in almost any household, but she would love a family who will continue this smart girls training, take her on long walks around the neighborhood, and if there are other pets in the home, Daisy would love a playmate. Daisy still has lots of puppy energy and personality, she will need an adopter who is willing to her become the perfect family member. If you think you can give Daisy all the love she deserves and would like to meet her, please go to Petstablished.com or follow the link below to complete an application to adopt. name: Mims
description: Name: Mims Age: 10 - 12 years old Weight: 55 lbs Breed: Labrador Terrier Mix Sweet Mims was surrendered at the kill shelter when her owner decided her health concerns were too much trouble to deal with and asked that she be euthanized. Thankfully, Mims showed everyone she met what a complete sweetheart she is and the shelter reached out to us to see if we could nurse her back to health and give her a second chance at a loving home. Mims is a staff favorite who has a long list of hobbies! • she likes cuddling. • she loves to nap on the couch although she’s reluctant to climb up without encouragement. (it seems possible she was not allowed on furniture) • she loves a bit of tug and settling in with her popcorn 🍿 toy for a good chew • she loves all people. She’s incredibly friendly and gentle with people. • she loves little walks • she’s great at the vets office • she loves sun bathing and rolling in the grass • she’s great in the car Mims would do best in an adult only home or with older children. She does not get on well with other animals. Mims is listed as special needs due to her health concerns, please find her on our social media pages to see how far shes come. Mims is looking for a loving retirement home to give her all the love she has missed out on so far. If you think you can give Mims all the love she deserves and would like to meet her, please go to Petstablished.com or follow the link below to complete an application to adopt. name: Tyler
description: Name: Tyler Age: 15 years old Weight: 16 lbs Breed: Chihuahua Mix ⸻ Senior Chihuahua Tyler, who we pulled from ACC in July, is still looking for his forever home! Tyler loves to spend time outside and would be delighted to have access to a garden for sunbathing. Tyler is happy to be around other dogs as long as they are a similar energy level to him - buddy’s who like to nap! He is not looking for a playmate and prefers to be left to his own devices. Tyler loves car rides but is also quite happy to stay at home and has no seperation anxiety. Similarly, Tyler will be ok around cats who leave him alone, but will bark if they come too close. Tyler enjoys spending time with his human family, he is the most adorable compainion, but he can get nervous around strangers. Due to his age, Tyler would do best in an adult only home or with older children. Tyler has the early signs of canine dementia, so he needs someone willing to keep an eye on him if he starts to become confused or anxious. He needs someone who understands it will take him a while to understand new situations and will be patient when he needs time to adjust. Please consider opening your heart and home to give this sweetheart his perfect retirement home ❤️ If you think you can give Tyler all the love he deserves and would like to meet him, please go to Petstablished.com or follow the link below to complete an application to adopt.
